amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for the support of new nuclear weapons development under the Stockpile Services Advanced Concepts Initiative or for the Robust Nuclear Earth Penetrator (RNEP).

vote.text: Amendment SA 3263 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 55. Record Vote Number: 113.

action.text: Amendment SA 3263 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S6425-6433; text: CR S6426) To prohibit the use of funds for the support of new nuclear weapons development under the Stockpile Services Advanced Concepts Initiative or for the Robust Nuclear Earth Penetrator (RNEP).
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3263 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 55. Record Vote Number: 113.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3263 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 55. Record Vote Number: 113.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3263 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
